Posts.Content: Dec 8, 2013 01:50PM owlwatcher wrote: Regarding diep-my ps said that first you should try and use the skin left over from bmx with tissue expanders then if that fails then do diep. he said that if you go straight to diep you are throwing away the skin on your chest which might have been  a valid option for some people.

Posts.Content: Aug 22, 2012 01:46AM owlwatcher wrote: You know that whole nausea thing is somewhat different for each person. For instance on the day I had chemo and the morning after I couldn't keep anything down if I had eaten. So for me it worked that I didn't eat (before during or after)but drank fluids. You will find what works for you after you get into it.
